author: Chandelis Duster, CNN
title: DC's mayor says amount of funds allocated for coronavirus is 'infuriating'
description: Washington, DC, Mayor Muriel Bowser on Thursday said the District of Columbia was treated like a "territory" instead of a state after it was allocated $725 million less than the states in the latest coronavirus response bill.
content:
Washington (CNN)Washington, DC, Mayor Muriel Bowser on Thursday said the District of Columbia was treated like a "territory" instead of a state after it was allocated $725 million less than the states in the latest coronavirus response bill.
